Pathfind Education
UK-Registered Education Consultancy

Expert, cost-free support for your study abroad journey.

We manage your entire application process for universities in the UK, USA, Canada, Australia and New Zealand. Our professional guidance is completely free.

Read Our Blog Chat on WhatsApp Start Free Application

What You Receive

Our service is 100% free for students. We are funded by the universities to help you navigate the complex application systems.

1. University Selection

We analyse your grades and budget to find courses where you have the highest chance of acceptance.

2. Document Perfection

We review your personal statement and CV to ensure they meet the strict standards of admissions officers.

3. Offer & Acceptance

We track your application until you receive your offer letter and help you understand the next steps for enrolment.

Your Path to Acceptance

1

Connect

Click 'Start Free Application' to access our official intake form.
2

Review

We assess your profile and provide a shortlisted set of universities that fit your goals.
3

Offer

We manage the submission and track your application until you receive your offer letter.

Frequently Asked Questions

Is your service really free?

Absolutely. You will never pay us a fee. Universities allocate part of their marketing and recruitment budget to secure students. They pay a commission when we successfully refer and guide a student who enrolls. This commission effectively covers the cost of the advisory services we provide to you. Rest assured, our primary goal is to find the best academic and career fit for you based on your profile and goals, regardless of the commission structure.

Can you help with scholarships?

Yes. When we shortlist universities for you, we will highlight any automatic scholarships or bursaries you are eligible for based on your grades.

Which countries do you cover?

We specialise in higher education for the UK, USA, Canada, Australia, and New Zealand.

Ready to start your journey?

No account creation required here. Simply click the button below to go directly to our official intake form to start your application.
